turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: good afternoon rod my name is john and i see you're calling about your pending claims eight six seven five three one nine we can take care of this right away

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: but yeah this is the fourth time i'm contacting you and it's been a week now and i still haven't received any money what's going on

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: i understand your frustration i see your claim is ready to be paid but we need your approval of the settlement terms which we can take care of right now

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: didn't nobody tell me this i never saw your request came through for approval

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: i'm sorry about that let's take care of this right now i'll also re send you a copy but for now i just need your verbal agreement that by accepting the settlement you agree we can close out this matter and there will be no further action do you agree okay ron another is accepted the terms you'll see a check within five business days

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: yes and one more thing i noticed there was a rate increase in my latest bill i don't think that's fair or just a single incident

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: you're right i see they did go up however because you're a valued customer i can reverse surcharges effective immediately you okay with that

turns.speaker: Customer
turns.text: okay yes that works for me thank you

turns.speaker: Agent
turns.text: no thank you for your patience and understanding we value and appreciate your business thank you for calling a although insurance goodbye
